channel.title: How do i change start message
channel.description: Im not very good with this sort of thing and i need to know how to change the start message....ive got the megascape source but what do i do[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 07:03:44 AM[/size][hr]any help plz?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 23, 2006, 07:08:33 AM[/size][hr]ive found a long file with writing in and i found the start menu thing but i cant edit it...any1 tell me how i can edit it?

item.title: How do i change start message

item.description:

look for in client.java

  Poisoned = false;

the messages should be under that
